intro.name: Daft Denayrouze:
intro.text: Huh- whu– A child? Been a long time since I seen one of your kind around here

intro.name: Daft Denayrouze:
intro.text: Children of course, what else would I mean

intro.name: Daft Denayrouze:
intro.text: Look bud, now that you’re here I need your help with something. You know how to swim right? Of course you do, why else would you be at a pool.

intro.name: Daft Denayrouze:
intro.text: And I’ll unlock it, once you get my toys. They're down there, somewhere. You'll find ‘em.

intro.name: Daft Denayrouze:
intro.text: Once you find the toys just drop ‘em in my bucket here.

intro.name: Daft Denayrouze:
intro.text: Oh, and don’t stay down there too long.

milestone20.name: Scholar:
milestone20.text: Solunaris was once a great and prosperous kingdom

milestone20.name: Scholar:
milestone20.text: Commoners and Nobles alike came together to build a better future for everyone.
